data.actual_result: It says it's an invalid name and channel can't be made
data.expected_result: You should be able to make the channel as it involves dashes/underscores.
data.short_description: "Text channel names must be alphanumeric or involve dashes and underscores"
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a category - Create a channel in the category - Create a channel with underscores or dashes on each side ( *Dash in the middle only doesn't count*) - Look at the result.
